text.headline: Top honours for DBS chairman Peter Seah Lim Huat in this year's National Day awards
text.text: Mr Seah, 74, is the only recipient of the Order of Nila Utama (With Distinction) this year. Read more

text.headline: DBS chairman Peter Seah appointed to Council of Presidential Advisers
text.text: DBS chairman Peter Seah Lim Huat has been appointed as a member of the Council of Presidential Advisers by President Halimah Yacob. Read more

text.headline: Corporate governance serves as the backbone of a business
text.text: Companies with strong corporate governance practices are able to maintain high levels of trust and satisfaction among customers and stakeholders. Read more

text.headline: DBS, the Best Bank in the World
text.text: Global Finance named DBS the Best Bank in the World in 2018. DBS CEO Piyush Gupta and Chairman Peter Seah share their views on the bank's winning formula.

text.headline: Relearning the ropes
text.text: For veteran banker and DBS chairman Peter Seah, returning to banking in 2009 after a hiatus of about eight years meant having to get up to speed with an industry digitalised and transformed. Read more

text.headline: DBS Bank unveils learning centre to nurture talent for Singapore's finance industry
text.text: DBS Bank has launched its new learning, centre called DBS Academy, to train talent for Singapore's finance industry. Read more

text.headline: Seah Says DBS Can Bring Value, Strength to Bank Danamon
text.text: DBS Group Holdings Ltd. Chairman Peter Seah speaks about the company's planned purchase of PT Bank Danamon Indonesia. Watch video

text.headline: DBS to focus priority on existing operations
text.text: DBS will focus its priorities on existing businesses first, before attempting new takeovers or ventures, said Mr. Peter Seah, chairman of DBS Group. Read more

text.headline: Peter Seah to take over as chairman of Singapore's DBS
text.text: Peter Seah will take over as chairman of Singapore's DBS Group DBSM.SI from May 1, replacing Koh Boon Hwee who has been at the helm of Southeast Asia's largest bank since 2006. Read more
